SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.level

Class LevelParent

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.level.LevelParent
Direct Known Subclasses:
Level001, Level002, Level003, Level004
public abstract class LevelParent extends Object
The LevelParent class serves as an abstract base class for game levels. It provides common functionality and properties for managing game levels, including the root group, scene, player registration, background music initialization, and level view updates. Subclasses of LevelParent must implement the abstract methods userHasReachedTarget() and spawnEnemyUnits() to define specific level behavior.

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelParent

      public LevelParent(int currentLevelNumber, int numberOfPlayers, ActorSpawner actorSpawner, AudioManager audioManager)
      Constructs a new LevelParent instance.
      Parameters:
      currentLevelNumber - the current level number
      numberOfPlayers - the number of players
      actorSpawner - the actor spawner used to spawn actors in the game
      audioManager - the audio manager used to manage game audio

  • Method Details

    • updateLevelView

      public void updateLevelView()
      Updates the level view by displaying the heart display for each player and updating the background.

      This method retrieves the list of players from the actorSpawn object. Then, it iterates through the list of players and displays the heart display for each player using the levelView object. Finally, it updates the background of the level view.

    • getRoot

      public javafx.scene.Group getRoot()
      Returns the root group of the level.
      Returns:
      the root group of the level

    • getScene

      public javafx.scene.Scene getScene()
      Initializes and returns the scene for this level.
      Returns:
      The initialized scene.

    • getCurrentLevelNumber

      public int getCurrentLevelNumber()
      Retrieves the current level number.
      Returns:
      the current level number.

    • userHasReachedTarget

      public abstract boolean userHasReachedTarget()
      Determines if the user has reached the target to advance to the next level. This method should be implemented by subclasses to define the specific logic for reaching the target in the level.

    • spawnEnemyUnits

      public abstract void spawnEnemyUnits()
      Spawns enemy units in the game level. This method should be implemented by subclasses to define the specific logic for spawning enemy units.
